summary: The story of a Native American girl, abandoned on a tiny island, who is protected by a wild dog.
cast: Celia Milius|Larry Domasin|Ann Daniel|Carlos Romero|George Kennedy|Hal John Norman|Julie Payne|Martin Garralaga|Junior|John Alvar|Alex Montoya
keywords: girl and her dog|death of pet|island|dog to rescue|howling dog
title: La isla de los delfines azules
